name: capy-pay-backend
description: Backend service for Capy Pay - Cryptocurrency payments and exchanges

scripts.blockchain:status: node -e "const ServiceInitializer = require('./src/scripts/initializeServices.js'); const init = new ServiceInitializer(); init.getOverallStatus().then(status => console.log(JSON.stringify(status, null, 2)));"
scripts.blockchain:test: node -e "const { ethers } = require('ethers'); const provider = new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.BASE_RPC_URL || 'https://mainnet.base.org'); provider.getNetwork().then(network => console.log('Connected to:', network.name, 'Chain ID:', network.chainId)).catch(console.error);"
